summary_text: Part concert, part documentary, this film follows a band that rarely looks backward, yet for this project, they had to reflect on - and deconstruct - the band's history, in order to create something very new.

summary_text: Ex football player Mirko coming back in his hometown and start some suspicious business with his old friend Slavko.
